00034 /*******************************************************************************
00035  ********************************  DEFINES  ************************************
00036  ******************************************************************************/
00037 
00038 /* LS013B7DH03 SPI commands */
00039 #define LS013B7DH03_CMD_UPDATE     (0x01)
00040 #define LS013B7DH03_CMD_ALL_CLEAR  (0x04)
00041 
00042 /* Frequency of LCD polarity inversion. */
00043 #ifndef LS013B7DH03_POLARITY_INVERSION_FREQUENCY
00044 #define LS013B7DH03_POLARITY_INVERSION_FREQUENCY (128)
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #ifdef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00048 #define LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES     (2)
00049 #else
00050 #define LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES     (0)
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00054 
00055   #ifdef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00056     /* Static pool has been chosen for pixelmatix allocation.
00057        Disable the use of malloc for allocation of pixel matrices. */
00058     #undef USE_MALLOC
00059   #endif
00060 
00061   #ifdef USE_MALLOC
00062     /* malloc has been chosen for pixelmatix allocation.
00063        Disable the use of static pool for allocation of pixel matrices. */
00064     #undef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00065   #endif
00066 
00067 #endif /*  PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT  */

00076 typedef uint8_t PixelMatrixAlign_t;
00077 #else
00078   #if (1 == PIXEL_MATRIX_ALIGNMENT)
00079     typedef uint8_t PixelMatrixAlign_t;
00080   #elif (2 == PIXEL_MATRIX_ALIGNMENT)
00081     typedef uint16_t PixelMatrixAlign_t;
00082   #elif (4 == PIXEL_MATRIX_ALIGNMENT)
00083     typedef uint32_t PixelMatrixAlign_t;
00084   #else
00085     #error Unsupported PIXEL_MATRIX_ALIGNMENT.
00086   #endif
00087 #endif

00095 /* Static variables: */
00096 static uint8_t        lcdPolarity = 0;
00097 
00098 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00099 #ifdef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00100 #define PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_ELEMENTS                                \
00101   (PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_SIZE/sizeof(PixelMatrixAlign_t) +            \
00102    ((PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_SIZE%sizeof(PixelMatrixAlign_t))? 1 : 0))
00103 static PixelMatrixAlign_t  pixelMatrixPoolBase[PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_ELEMENTS];
00104 static PixelMatrixAlign_t* pixelMatrixPool = pixelMatrixPoolBase;
00105 #endif
00106 #endif

00151 /**************************************************************************/
00156 EMSTATUS DISPLAY_Ls013b7dh03Init(void)
00157 {
00158   DISPLAY_Device_t      display;
00159   EMSTATUS              status;
00160 
00161   /* Initialize the Platform Abstraction Layer (PAL) interface.  */
00162   PAL_TimerInit();
00163   PAL_SpiInit();
00164   PAL_GpioInit();
00165 
00166   /* Setup GPIOs */
00167   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_SCLK,    LCD_PIN_SCLK,    palGpioModePushPull,0);
00168   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_SI,      LCD_PIN_SI,      palGpioModePushPull,0);
00169   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_SCS,     LCD_PIN_SCS,     palGpioModePushPull,0);
00170 #if defined( LCD_PORT_DISP_SEL  )
00171   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_DISP_SEL,LCD_PIN_DISP_SEL,palGpioModePushPull,0);
00172 #endif
00173   
00174 #if defined( LCD_PORT_DISP_PWR )
00175   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_DISP_PWR,LCD_PIN_DISP_PWR,palGpioModePushPull,0);
00176 #endif
00177 
00178 #if defined( LCD_PORT_EXTMODE )
00179   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_EXTMODE, LCD_PIN_EXTMODE, palGpioModePushPull,0);
00180 #endif
00181   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_EXTCOMIN,LCD_PIN_EXTCOMIN,palGpioModePushPull,0);
00182 
00183 #ifdef PAL_TIMER_REPEAT_FUNCTION
00184   /* If the platform specifies to use a timer repeat function we should
00185      register the DisplayPolarityInverse to be called every second in
00186      order to toggle the EXTCOMIN pin at 1Hz.
00187   */
00188   status =
00189     PAL_TimerRepeat((void(*)(void*)) DisplayPolarityInverse, 0,
00190                     LS013B7DH03_POLARITY_INVERSION_FREQUENCY);
00191 #elif defined POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN_PAL_AUTO_TOGGLE
00192   /* Setup system (via PAL) to toggle the EXTCOMIN pin every second. */
00193   status = PAL_GpioPinAutoToggle(LCD_PORT_EXTCOMIN, LCD_PIN_EXTCOMIN,
00194                                  LS013B7DH03_POLARITY_INVERSION_FREQUENCY);
00195 #else
00196   /* System does not support toggling the EXTCOMIN pin. Return error. */
00197   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED;
00198 #endif
00199   if (PAL_EMSTATUS_OK != status)
00200   {
00201     return status;
00202   }
00203 
00204   /* Setup and register the LS013B7DH03 as a DISPLAY device now. */
00205   display.name                  = SHARP_MEMLCD_DEVICE_NAME;
00206   display.colourMode            = DISPLAY_COLOUR_MODE_MONOCHROME_INVERSE;
00207   display.addressMode           = DISPLAY_ADDRESSING_BY_ROWS_ONLY;
00208   display.geometry.width        = LS013B7DH03_WIDTH;
00209   display.geometry.height       = LS013B7DH03_HEIGHT;
00210   /* stride = pixels + ctrl bytes */
00211   display.geometry.stride       =
00212     display.geometry.width + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES*8;
00213 
00214   display.pDisplayPowerOn       = DisplayEnable;
00215 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00216   display.pPixelMatrixAllocate  = PixelMatrixAllocate;
00217   display.pPixelMatrixFree      = PixelMatrixFree;
00218 #else
00219   display.pPixelMatrixAllocate  = NULL;
00220   display.pPixelMatrixFree      = NULL;
00221 #endif
00222   display.pPixelMatrixDraw      = PixelMatrixDraw;
00223   display.pPixelMatrixClear     = PixelMatrixClear;
00224   display.pDriverRefresh        = DriverRefresh;
00225 
00226   status = DISPLAY_DeviceRegister (&display);
00227 
00228   if (DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK == status)
00229   {
00230     /* Turn on display. */
00231     DisplayEnable(&display, true);
00232 
00233     /* Clear display */
00234     DisplayClear();
00235   }
00236 
00237   return status;
00238 }

00245 /**************************************************************************/
00252 static EMSTATUS DriverRefresh(DISPLAY_Device_t* device)
00253 {
00254   EMSTATUS      status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00255 
00256   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00257 
00258   /* Reinitialize the timer and SPI configuration.  */
00259   PAL_TimerInit();
00260   PAL_SpiInit();
00261 
00262   return status;
00263 }

00266 /**************************************************************************/
00279 static EMSTATUS DisplayEnable(DISPLAY_Device_t* device,
00280                               bool              enable)
00281 {
00282   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00283 
00284   if (enable)
00285   {
00286 #if defined( LCD_PORT_DISP_SEL )
00287     /* Set EFM_DISP_SELECT pin. */
00288     PAL_GpioPinOutSet(LCD_PORT_DISP_SEL, LCD_PIN_DISP_SEL);
00289 #endif
00290 
00291 #if defined( LCD_PORT_DISP_PWR )
00292     /* Drive voltage on EFM_DISP_PWR_EN pin. */
00293     PAL_GpioPinOutSet(LCD_PORT_DISP_PWR, LCD_PIN_DISP_PWR);
00294 #endif
00295   }
00296   else
00297   {
00298 #if defined( LCD_PORT_DISP_PWR )
00299     /* Stop driving voltage on EFM_DISP_PWR_EN pin. */
00300     PAL_GpioPinOutClear(LCD_PORT_DISP_PWR, LCD_PIN_DISP_PWR);
00301 #endif
00302 
00303 #if defined( LCD_PORT_DISP_SEL )
00304     /* Clear EFM_DISP_SELECT pin. */
00305     PAL_GpioPinOutClear(LCD_PORT_DISP_SEL, LCD_PIN_DISP_SEL);
00306 #endif
00307   }
00308 
00309   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00310 }

00313 /**************************************************************************/
00320 static EMSTATUS DisplayClear ( void )
00321 {
00322   uint16_t cmd;
00323 
00324   /* Set SCS */
00325   PAL_GpioPinOutSet( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00326 
00327   /* SCS setup time: min 6us */
00328   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(6);
00329 
00330   /* Send command */
00331   cmd = LS013B7DH03_CMD_ALL_CLEAR | lcdPolarity;
00332   PAL_SpiTransmit ((uint8_t*) &cmd, 2 );
00333 
00334   /* SCS hold time: min 2us */
00335   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(2);
00336 
00337   /* Clear SCS */
00338   PAL_GpioPinOutClear( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00339 
00340   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00341 }

00344 #ifdef PAL_TIMER_REPEAT_FUNCTION
00345 
00346 /**************************************************************************/
00354 static EMSTATUS DisplayPolarityInverse (void)
00355 {
00356 #ifdef POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN
00357 
00358   /* Toggle extcomin gpio */
00359   PAL_GpioPinOutToggle( LCD_PORT_EXTCOMIN, LCD_PIN_EXTCOMIN );
00360 
00361 #else /* POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN */
00362 
00363   /* Send a packet with inverted com */
00364   PAL_GpioPinOutSet( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00365 
00366   /* SCS setup time: min 6us */
00367   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(6);
00368 
00369   /* Send polarity command including dummy bits */
00370   PAL_SpiTransmit ((uint8_t*) &lcdPolarity, 2 );
00371 
00372   /* SCS hold time: min 2us */
00373   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(2);
00374 
00375   PAL_GpioPinOutClear( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00376 
00377   /* Invert com polarity */
00378   if (lcdPolarity == 0x00)
00379   {
00380     lcdPolarity = 0x02;
00381   }
00382   else
00383   {
00384     lcdPolarity = 0x00;
00385   }
00386 
00387 #endif /* POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN */
00388 
00389   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00390 }
00391 
00392 #endif /* POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN_PAL_AUTO_TOGGLE */

00395 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00396 /**************************************************************************/
00414 static EMSTATUS PixelMatrixAllocate( DISPLAY_Device_t*      device,
00415                                      unsigned int           width,
00416 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00417                                      unsigned int           userStride,
00418 #endif
00419                                      unsigned int           height,
00420                                      DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t *pixelMatrix)
00421 {
00422 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00423   unsigned int allocSize = (userStride/8 + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES) * height;
00424 #else
00425   unsigned int allocSize = (width/8 + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES) * height;
00426 #endif
00427 
00428   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00429 
00430   if (width != LS013B7DH03_WIDTH)
00431     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OUT_OF_RANGE;
00432 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00433   if (userStride < width)
00434     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00435 #endif
00436 
00437 #ifdef USE_MALLOC
00438 
00439   /* Allocate the pixel matrix buffer including 2 control bytes per line. */
00440   *pixelMatrix = (DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t) malloc (allocSize);
00441 
00442   if (NULL == *pixelMatrix)
00443     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_ENOUGH_MEMORY;
00444   else
00445     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00446 
00447 #endif /* USE_MALLOC */
00448 
00449 #ifdef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00450 
00451   if (((uint8_t*)pixelMatrixPool)     + allocSize >
00452       ((uint8_t*)pixelMatrixPoolBase) + PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_SIZE)
00453   {
00454     *pixelMatrix     = NULL;
00455     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_ENOUGH_MEMORY;
00456   }
00457   else
00458   {
00459     *pixelMatrix     = pixelMatrixPool;
00460     pixelMatrixPool += allocSize / sizeof(PixelMatrixAlign_t) +
00461       ((allocSize % sizeof(PixelMatrixAlign_t))? 1 : 0);
00462     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00463   }
00464 
00465 #endif /* USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL */
00466 
00467 }
00468 #endif /* PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT */
00469 
00470 
00471 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00472 /**************************************************************************/
00482 static EMSTATUS PixelMatrixFree( DISPLAY_Device_t*     device,
00483                                  DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t pixelMatrix)
00484 {
00485   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00486 
00487 #ifdef USE_MALLOC
00488   free(pixelMatrix);
00489   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00490 #endif /* USE_MALLOC */
00491 
00492 #ifdef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00493   /* The non-malloc PixelMatrixAllocate function only allocates buffers
00494      consequtively from a pool. It is not possible to free the buffers.
00495      I.e. this allocator can only be used for one-shot allocations of
00496      buffers that will should never be freed and re-alloced.
00497   */
00498   (void) pixelMatrix;   /* Supress compiles warning: unused parameter. */
00499   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED;
00500 #endif
00501 }
00502 #endif /* PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT */

00505 /**************************************************************************/
00522 static EMSTATUS PixelMatrixClear( DISPLAY_Device_t*      device,
00523                                   DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t  pixelMatrix,
00524                                   unsigned int           width,
00525                                   unsigned int           height)
00526 {
00527   uint8_t*       pByte = (uint8_t*) pixelMatrix;
00528   unsigned int   i;
00529 
00530   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00531   (void) width;  /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00532 
00533   for (i=0; i<height; i++)
00534   {
00535     /* Clear line */
00536     memset(pByte, 0, LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8);
00537     pByte += LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8;
00538 
00539 #ifdef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00540     /* Set dummy byte. */
00541     *pByte++ = 0xff;
00542     /* Set address of next line */
00543     *pByte++ = i+1;
00544 #endif
00545   }
00546 
00547   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00548 }
00549 
00550 
00551 #ifdef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00552 /**************************************************************************/
00563 static EMSTATUS pixelMatrixSetup( DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t  pixelMatrix,
00564                                   unsigned int           startRow,
00565                                   unsigned int           height
00566 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00567                                   ,
00568                                   unsigned int           userStride
00569 #endif
00570                                   )
00571 {
00572   int       i          = 0;
00573   uint8_t*  pByte      = (uint8_t*) pixelMatrix;
00574 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00575   int       strideGap  =
00576     (userStride-LS013B7DH03_WIDTH-(LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES*8)) /
00577     8 / sizeof(uint8_t);
00578   if ((userStride-LS013B7DH03_WIDTH) % sizeof(uint16_t))
00579     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00580 #endif
00581 
00582   while (i<height)
00583   {
00584     pByte += LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8;
00585     /* Set dummy byte. */
00586     *pByte++ = 0xff;
00587 
00588     if (i == height-1)
00589     {
00590       /* Set dummy data at end of last line. */
00591       *pByte++ = 0xff;
00592       break;
00593     }
00594     else
00595       /* Set address of next line */
00596       *pByte++ = startRow + (++i);
00597 
00598 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00599     pByte += strideGap;
00600 #endif
00601   }
00602 
00603   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00604 }
00605 
00606 #endif /* USE_CONTROL_BYTES */
00607 
00608 
00609 /**************************************************************************/
00626 static EMSTATUS PixelMatrixDraw( DISPLAY_Device_t*      device,
00627                                  DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t  pixelMatrix,
00628                                  unsigned int           startColumn,
00629                                  unsigned int           width,
00630 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00631                                  unsigned int           userStride,
00632 #endif
00633                                  unsigned int           startRow,
00634                                  unsigned int           height )
00635 {
00636   unsigned int i;
00637   uint16_t*    p = (uint16_t *)pixelMatrix;
00638   uint16_t     cmd;
00639 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00640   int          strideGap =
00641     (userStride-width-(LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES*8)) / 8 / sizeof(uint16_t);
00642   if ((userStride-width) % sizeof(uint16_t))
00643     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00644 #else
00645   (void) width;  /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00646 #endif
00647   (void) startColumn;  /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00648   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00649 
00650   /* Need to adjust start row by one because LS013B7DH03 starts counting lines
00651      from 1, while the DISPLAY interface starts from 0. */
00652   startRow++;
00653 
00654 #ifdef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00655   /* Setup line addressing in control words. */
00656   pixelMatrixSetup(pixelMatrix, startRow, height
00657 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00658                    , userStride
00659 #endif
00660                    );
00661 #endif
00662 
00663   /* Assert SCS */
00664   PAL_GpioPinOutSet( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00665 
00666   /* SCS setup time: min 6us */
00667   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(6);
00668 
00669   /* Send update command and first line address */
00670   cmd = LS013B7DH03_CMD_UPDATE | (startRow << 8);
00671   PAL_SpiTransmit((uint8_t*) &cmd, 2 );
00672 
00673   /* Get start address to draw from */
00674   for ( i=0; i<height; i++ ) {
00675 
00676     /* Send pixels for this line */
00677     PAL_SpiTransmit((uint8_t*) p,
00678                     LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8 + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES);
00679     p+=(LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8 + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES) / sizeof(uint16_t);
00680 
00681 #ifndef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00682     if (i==height-1)
00683     {
00684       cmd = 0xffff;
00685     }
00686     else
00687     {
00688       cmd = 0xff | ((startRow+i+1) << 8);
00689     }
00690     PAL_SpiTransmit((uint8_t*) &cmd, 2 );
00691 #endif
00692 
00693 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00694     p += strideGap;
00695 #endif
00696 
00697   }
00698 
00699   /* SCS hold time: min 2us */
00700   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(2);
00701 
00702   /* De-assert SCS */
00703   PAL_GpioPinOutClear( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00704 
00705   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00706 }
